discourse_list.title: Content Production Bi-Weekly Update: June 25 - July 7, 2021

content.content: Greetings from the Content Production Core Unit! Here’s what we’ve been up to for the last couple of weeks.  Administrative Updates   We’re excited to welcome Kat Obermeyer to the team and back to MakerDAO! Many of you are familiar with her work; Kat created the original design work for MakerDAO and was responsible for setting up Maker Chat and will be helping us out on design and community management.   Moved our budget for August through October to Formal Submission   Repaid Seth & Jerry for expenses paid out-of-pocket prior to our first budget distribution (Incorporation, Tax Advice, GSuite, Notion, etc.)    Content Production Video Production   Hosted AMAs:  Maker Portfolio Core Unit with Chris Cameron A Deep Dai-ve with Centrifuge and Tinlake    Published video from:  The Fed Comes to MakerDAO Tokenizing Real-World Assets with CurioInvest AMA with Will Remor of Real-World Finance    Started planning educational video production focusing on technical and governance-related topics  Preparing scripts/storyboards Finding music, voice actors Coordinating with GovAlpha, Protocol Engineering, other CUs on content    Community Portal  Solved the issue getting Gatsby to communicate with Github Pages Got MetaMask to whitelist makerdao.world   Other  Announced the Mascot Art Contest  A Look at Dai on Different Chains Met with GovComms to develop strategy for expanding Maker Relay Much of the work we’re doing for other Core Units can be seen on our Request For Content Dashboard.   Looking Ahead In the coming weeks, we’ll be:  Continuing educational video production Starting to publish content on the Community Blog  Preparing an initial update of the Community Portal  As always, check out our Transparency Dashboard to see what we’re working on and please join us for our weekly Office Hours on Tuesdays at 14:30 UTC.
This topic was automatically closed 30 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
